org.echo.mobile.framework.service

Interface AccountsService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatabaseApiService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseApiServiceImpl

    public AccountsService

    Encapsulates logic, associated with data from account from blockchain database API

    {@see http://docs.bitshares.org/api/database.html#accounts}

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getFullAccounts(java.util.List<java.lang.String> namesOrIds, boolean subscribe, Callback<java.util.Map> callback)
      Fetch all objects relevant to the specified accounts and subscribe to updates.
      Result<java.lang.Exception,java.util.Map> getFullAccounts(java.util.List<java.lang.String> namesOrIds, boolean subscribe)
      Fetch all objects relevant to the specified accounts and subscribe to updates.

    • Method Detail

      • getFullAccounts

        void getFullAccounts(java.util.List<java.lang.String> namesOrIds,
                     boolean subscribe,
                     Callback<java.util.Map> callback)

        Fetch all objects relevant to the specified accounts and subscribe to updates.

        Parameters:
        namesOrIds - Each item must be the name or ID of an account to retrieve
        subscribe - Flag for subscribe options, true if need to subscribe on changes
        callback - Async listening result

      • getFullAccounts

        Result<java.lang.Exception,java.util.Map> getFullAccounts(java.util.List<java.lang.String> namesOrIds,
                                                          boolean subscribe)

        Fetch all objects relevant to the specified accounts and subscribe to updates.

        Parameters:
        namesOrIds - Each item must be the name or ID of an account to retrieve
        subscribe - Flag for subscribe options, true if need to subscribe on changes
        Returns:
        Synchronized return result
